name: Roulettie
description:
Its my first project here! Wish me luck!

Create bets by "Left-Clicking" on the appropriate bet location.

You start with 200. Just easy game version to check if its playable. All working on pure physics!

Srandart rulles from casino roulette! Try to win! =)

Everything was drawn in blender and its works fine! (Also my first work XD)

Enjoy!
